dimension: 12 1/2 x 25 in. (31.75 x 63.5 cm) (neck to waist)
title: Saint's Shirt
description: red striped, with stripes in purple, dark and light green, blue and light blue, yellow, orange, peach, pink and indigo blue with ikat designs; sleeves, cuffs and collar woven apart and sewn to main body
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
